Title: Cortico-cortical efferents of primary motor and somatosensory regions of the cerebral cortex in Macaca fascicularis

@BrainMaps_UnspecificAdoption.Citation: "Twelve adult monkeys (Macaca fascicularis) were given single local injections of radioactive amino acids into the pericentral cortex... The injection sites were anatomically defined according to the maps of Woolsey and his collaborators (Woolsey, Marshall & Bard, 1942; Woolsey & Fairman, 1946; Woolsey, Settlage, Meyer, Sencer, Hamury & Travis, 1952). Accordingly, injections were aimed at sites representing the major regions of the body. In the subsequent description, the respective cases are referred to as 'leg', 'trunk', 'arm', or 'face' cases." (p. 25)

@Injections.Citation: "The caudal opercular..are labeled most prominent in the `face` experiments (74-872 and 75-333)"
"In addition to the bilateral projection..,the precentral `face` region projects..(bilaterally in case 72-448, ipsilaterally in case 73-320),.."
"..,case 72-449 with an injection of the precentral trunk region.."
"Case 72-450, with an injection in the precentral `arm` region.."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Precentral efferents within the ipsi- and contalateral frontal lobe project to areas 4,6 and 24 ( FA,FB,FC,FBA and LC ). In other words, MI and MII are particularly involved...Case 72-450, with an injection in the precentral `arm` region exemplifies the bilateral frontal projection pattern."

"Precentral efferents within the ipsi- and contalateral frontal lobe project to areas 4,6 and 24 ( FA,FB,FC,FBA and LC ). In other words, MI and MII are particularly involved...Case 72-450, with an injection in the precentral `arm` region exemplifies the bilateral frontal projection pattern."

@Injections.Citation: "In addition to the bilateral projection..,the precentral `face` region projects..(bilaterally in case 72-448, ipsilaterally in case 73-320),.."
"The most extensive grain distribution appears after a triple injection into the postcentral `trunk` region"
"The projections of the postcentral `arm` cases (cases 74-464 and 74-978).."
"The projection of the postcentral `arm` cases (cases 74-464 and 74-978).."

"Projections of the postcentral gyrus (SI) ... The ipsilateral grain distribution in the postcentral 'leg' case (case 74-677) is slightly more restricted in its rostro-caudal extent than that just described ... " (pp. 31-32)

publication.title: Cortico-cortical efferents of primary motor and somatosensory regions of the cerebral cortex in Macaca fascicularis
